DOC.brief_title: Construct Validity Diagnostic Hysteroscopy Training Model
DOC.detailed_description: In prospective case-control study , 140 medical student ( , novice ' ) 10 senior gynecologist ( , expert ' ) watch demonstration detail perform hysteroscopy training model . All probands perform hysteroscopy within 1 hour demonstration . Their performance judge use Objective Structured Assessment Technical Skills ( OSATS ) assessment . Using metrical non-metrical measurement , construct validity hysteroscopy train model distinguish expert novice assess . Secondary endpoint difference OSATS score within group novice base gender handyness , well satisfaction novice learn experience .
